mapper.select: select c.idx, c.part as part, c.partIdx, b.title as title, b.nickName as nickName, c.cpMid as cpMid, c.cpContent as cpContent, date_format(c.cpDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as cpDate, c.progress, b.mid as mid, b.content as content from complaint c left join board2 b on c.partIdx=b.idx where progress = #{part} order by c.idx desc;
select count(*) from complaint where progress = #{part}

select c.idx, c.part as part, b.title as title, b.nickName as nickName, c.cpMid as cpMid, c.cpContent as cpContent, date_format(c.cpDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as cpDate, c.progress, b.mid as mid, b.content as content from complaint c left join board2 b on c.partIdx=b.idx where c.partIdx=#{partIdx} limit 1;

choose.when: SELECT idx AS fileIdx, 'Guest' AS category, '없음' AS fileName, name AS uploaderMid, content AS fileTitle, 0 AS fileSize, vDate AS uploadDate, hostIp FROM guest ORDER BY idx DESC
SELECT idx AS fileIdx, 'Board' AS category, '없음' AS fileName, mid AS uploaderMid, title AS fileTitle, 0 AS fileSize, wDate AS uploadDate, hostIp FROM board2 ORDER BY idx DESC
SELECT idx AS fileIdx, 'Pds' AS category, fName AS fileName, mid AS uploaderMid, title AS fileTitle, fSize AS fileSize, fDate AS uploadDate, hostIp FROM pds2 ORDER BY idx DESC
choose.otherwise: SELECT '알 수 없는 카테고리' AS fileTitle FROM DUAL WHERE 1=0

mapper.update: update member set level = #{level} where idx = #{idx};
update board2 set complaint = 'OK' where idx = #{partIdx};
update board2 set complaint = #{flag} where idx = #{partIdx};
update complaint set progress = #{complaintSw} where idx = #{idx};
